appetizers.name: Fried Pickels
Pickles fried in batter with the perfect mix to give you a wonderful southern snack.

appetizers.name: Pasta Salad
Pasta salad is a staple side served as a cold mix if pasta with vinegar and spices.

appetizers.name: Chips
Simple potatoe chips that go with any sandwitch, with your choice of oven baked or fried

cold sandwitches.name: Deli Club
A classic cold sandwitch with turkey and bacon on your choice of bread and cheese.

cold sandwitches.name: Ham & Cheese
A simple ham and cheese with your choice of bread, lettuce, and tomatoe.

cold sandwitches.name: egg salad
A more Japaneese styled egg salad sandwitch which has a sweet tasting bite.

hot sandwitches.name: Ruben sandwitch
A hot sandwitch with a spicy kick, made with all natural kosher friendly ingredients this meal goes well with a cold day

hot sandwitches.name: grilled cheese
An origanal style of warm sandwitch with a simple recipe of cheese, bread, and butter. This meal comes with some tomatoe soup on the side.

desserts.name: Cheese cake
New York style with your choice of sauce on top, a classic dessert or a sweet snack.

desserts.name: ice cream
Plain vanilla ice cream, used to cool you off on a hot summer day.

Drinks.name: lemonade
Old fashioned lemonade for a warm day, simple mix of lemon juice, water, and sugar.

Drinks.name: coffee
Coffee is a great caffinated drink to pick you up when you need it. Perfect with cream, milk, sugar, and flavoring it ties together well when hot or iced.
